name: CarpeDiemBeds
0:
”Alexa, set My Bed to Position TV”
”Alexa, turn on Light on My Bed”
”Alexa, turn on massage on My Bed”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to adjust your Carpe Diem Beds Skill-powered comfort bed. This Skill supports the Vindö bed’s advanced dual actuator systems as well as LA18 IC advanced. The Skill works via a Wi-Fi box (WiFi2LIN001) connecting the bed to the internet.

Features available via the Carpe Diem Beds Control Skill:

- Control up to four favourite positions of your Vindö bed (set in the Carpe Diem Beds App).
- Move your Vindö bed to favorite positions.
- Turn Under Bed Light ON and OFF.
- Turn massage ON and OFF (if supported by your bed system).
